name: Beacon (itch) (M. R. Williams)
description:
You are a maintenance robot on a remote space outpost on a planetoid hundreds of lightyears from Earth. You have been awoken by Emergency Protocol, and it is now up to you to discover the fate of the station and its inhabitants.

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
Jump: Space Interact: E or Enter

Credits

Backgrounds courtesy of Chantier Tileset by @gtibo
Writing and Additional Level Designs by @King Izzy

This game is in preview, and much more is to be added soon. In the meantime, see if you can find three of the base's inhabitants and learn of their final moments.
